name: Doorbell Game
description:
Inspired by Mao Mao: Heroes of Pure Heart, Episode 13: "Thumb War", by Parker Simmons

Play on your browser with your friend The Doorbell Game from Mao Mao!

Compete against your friend! Who will get the neighbor out first? Ring away to find out!

Made by Xanthos Ware. Follow my Twitter on @XanthosWare!

Additional assistance with sound effect by Adam Smith (dragnmastr85). Check him out on SoundCloud:

https://soundcloud.com/dragnmastr85?ref=clipboard
